bundle.page.kdb.title: Knowledge Database Management
bundle.page.kdb.desc: You're in charge of managing the Knowledge Database for the application. Here's what you can do:
bundle.page.kdb.ai.title: Add Information
bundle.page.kdb.ai.desc: Enter question-answer pairs manually or upload PDF documents to expand the database.
bundle.page.kdb.me.title: Modify Entries
bundle.page.kdb.me.desc: Update existing data to keep it accurate and relevant.
bundle.page.kdb.rid.title: Remove Irrelevant Data
bundle.page.kdb.rid.desc: Delete outdated or unnecessary entries to maintain a clean and efficient knowledge base.
bundle.page.rs.title: Users' Conversation Report Statistics
bundle.page.rs.desc: You're responsible for monitoring and analyzing conversation reports to improve the chatbot's performance. Here's what you can do:
bundle.page.rs.vcs.title: View Conversation Statistics
bundle.page.rs.vcs.desc: Access detailed insights on how users interact with the chatbot.
bundle.page.rs.dr.title: Download Reports
bundle.page.rs.dr.desc: Export statistics in CSV format for further analysis.
bundle.footer.title: © 2025 Ivan Krylosov | TR Chatbot | AI-Powered Chat Assistant
